item.title: Specify the build time environment variables
item.description:
Environment variables are used to configure buildpack behavior. They may be specified by:

  • The platform operator (this page)
  • The end user (see Customize buildpack behavior with build-time environment variables)
  • Other buildpacks (see Specify the environment)

item.description: A stack is the grouping together of the build and run base images, represented by a unique ID.
